ddf.catalog.resource.download

Class ReliableResourceDownloadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.resource.download.ReliableResourceDownloadManager

  • public class ReliableResourceDownloadManager
extends Object
    The manager for downloading a resource, including retrying the download if problems are encountered, and optionally caching the resource as it is streamed to the client.

      • init

      • download

        public ResourceResponse download(ResourceRequest resourceRequest,
                                 Metacard metacard,
                                 ResourceRetriever retriever)
                          throws DownloadException
        Parameters:
        resourceRequest - the original @ResourceRequest to retrieve the resource
        metacard - the @Metacard associated with the resource being downloaded
        retriever - the @ResourceRetriever to be used to get the resource
        Returns:
        the modified @ResourceResponse with the @ReliableResourceInputStream that the client should read from
        Throws:
        DownloadException
